radiographic_examinations.findings: Focal fat stranding and wall thickening along the lateral proximal ascending colon with thickening of the right lateroconal fascia; Epicenter of inflammation is centered around the ascending colon. Normal findings in the liver, pancreas, spleen, adrenals, kidneys, bladder, and reproductive organs. Trace free fluid in pelvis. No evidence of diverticula or significant pathology in other regions.
